database.name: VIEW SLQS_PRD_SAFETY_V
database.view: SELECT mpl.m_productionline_id AS slqs_prd_safety_v_id, mpl.ad_org_id, mpl.ad_client_id, mpl.isactive, now() AS created, mpl.createdby, now() AS updated, mpl.updatedby, mpl.m_product_id, mp.value AS code, mpl.c_uom_id, mpl.m_attributesetinstance_id, mpl.m_productionplan_id, mpp.ma_costcenter_version_id, mpl.movementqty, mpp.starttime, mpp.endtime, mpd.m_production_id, mpd.movementdate AS date_part_work, mpd.starttime AS start_part_work, mpd.endtime AS end_part_work, mpl.m_locator_id, mpc.em_slqs_status, to_char('Y') AS btn_gen_ctrl, mpc.em_slqs_m_prod_line_id AS m_productionline_id, mp.em_slqs_mp_per_ctrl AS ma_periodic_control_id, mpd.documentno AS doc_part_work FROM m_productionplan mpp JOIN m_production mpd ON mpd.m_production_id = mpp.m_production_id JOIN m_productionline mpl ON mpp.m_productionplan_id = mpl.m_productionplan_id JOIN m_product mp ON mp.m_product_id = mpl.m_product_id LEFT JOIN ma_pc_case mpc ON mpc.m_product_id = mpl.m_product_id AND mpl.m_attributesetinstance_id = mpc.m_attributesetinstance_id WHERE mpl.productiontype = '+'
